sentences.en: "She has a large flat in Mayfair." — "Just so."
sentences.cn: “她在梅费尔有个大公寓。”——“正是。”

sentences.en: a convict still at large.
sentences.cn: 仍未归案的罪犯

sentences.en: A large number of students have signed up for the course.
sentences.cn: 很多学生报名读这门课程。

sentences.en: a large ovenproof pan
sentences.cn: 一只耐热的大烤盘

sentences.en: A smallholding in the hills could not support a large family.
sentences.cn: 山间的一小块耕地是不可能养活一大家人的。

sentences.en: ambassador-at-large.
sentences.cn: 无任所大使

sentences.en: Chris likes music and has a large collection of albums and cassettes.
sentences.cn: 克里斯喜欢音乐，收集了大量的唱片和磁带。

sentences.en: councilor-at-large.
sentences.cn: 代表整个地区的议员

sentences.en: During fever a large quantity of fluid is lost in perspiration.
sentences.cn: 发烧时，大量水分会通过排汗而丧失。

sentences.en: Fiction takes up a large slice of the publishing market.
sentences.cn: 小说在出版市场上占了很大的份额。

sentences.en: He was in large part a journalist and propagandist.
sentences.cn: 他很大程度上是个新闻记者和宣传者。

sentences.en: Large overseas-based trusts are an excellent each way bet.
sentences.cn: 大型海外基金的投资前景非常好。

sentences.en: Large paintings can enhance the feeling of space in small rooms.
sentences.cn: 大型油画可以增加小房间的宽敞感。

sentences.en: large sums ofmoney
sentences.cn: 大笔的钱

sentences.en: Los Angeles is the second largest city in the US.
sentences.cn: 洛杉矶是美国的第二大城市。

sentences.en: The cast of characters in the scandal is bewilderingly large.
sentences.cn: 卷入丑闻的人多得让人眼花缭乱。

sentences.en: the country at large.
sentences.cn: 整个国家

sentences.en: The holes were sufficiently large to serve as nests.
sentences.cn: 这些洞作鸟巢足够大。

sentences.en: The house was large and full of art treasures.
sentences.cn: 房子很大，里面摆满了艺术珍品。

sentences.en: the success of the conference was due in large part to its organizers.
sentences.cn: 讨论会的成功在很大程度上应归功于组织者。

sentences.en: the success of the conference was due in large part to its organizers.
sentences.cn: 讨论会的成功在很大程度上应归功于组织者。

sentences.en: the success of the conference was due in large part to its organizers.
sentences.cn: 讨论会的成功在很大程度上应归功于组织者。

sentences.en: The T-shirt comes in Small, Medium and Large.
sentences.cn: 这种T恤有小号、中号和大号。

sentences.en: These large institutions make — and change—the rules to suit themselves.
sentences.cn: 这些大机构总是随意制定规定，而且说变就变。

sentences.en: those who drink large amounts of coffee
sentences.cn: 咖啡喝得很多的人

sentences.en: To the side of the large star is a smaller star.
sentences.cn: 大星星旁边是一颗小一点的星星。

sentences.en: Use recorded delivery for large cheques or money orders.
sentences.cn: 对于大额的支票和汇款单要使用挂号邮寄。

sentences.en: Wind turbines are large and noisy and they disfigure the landscape.
sentences.cn: 风力涡轮机个头大、噪音响，还会破坏周边风景。

words.tran_cn: 大的;广博的;巨大的;广大的

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)出去享乐（多为饮酒或吸毒）；去逛俱乐部

trans.tran_cn: 大的，大量的，广泛的，大型的
trans.tran_en: big in size, amount, or number
